deposit_window.description: Number of seconds for which lockup deposits will be accepted

generator_address.description: Generator (Staking for dual rewards) contract address

init_timestamp.description: Timestamp when Contract will start accepting LP Token deposits

lockdrop_incentives.description: Total MARS lockdrop incentives to be distributed among the users

max_duration.description: Max. no. of days allowed for lockup

min_duration.description: Min. no. of days allowed for lockup

withdrawal_window.description: Withdrawal Window Length :: Post the deposit window

Decimal256.description: A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal256(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0 The greatest possible value that can be represented is 115792089237316195423570985008687907853269984665640564039457.584007913129639935 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
